# <a name="replying-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="85fba-102">Svara i Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="85fba-102">Replying in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="85fba-103">Att svara på ett meddelande i taget:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="85fba-103">To reply to one message at a time:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="85fba-104">Välj som du vill svara på meddelandet i meddelandelistan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="85fba-104">In your message list, choose the message that you want to reply to.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="85fba-105">Överst i meddelandefönstret, markera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="85fba-105">At the top right of the message pane, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="85fba-106">**Svar** eller</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="85fba-106">**Reply** or</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="85fba-107">**Svara alla**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="85fba-107">**Reply all**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="85fba-108">Skriv meddelandet och klicka på **Skicka**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="85fba-108">Type your message and then select **Send**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="85fba-109">Som automatiskt svarar på alla meddelanden:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="85fba-109">To automatically reply to all messages:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="85fba-110">Gå till</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="85fba-110">Go to</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
<span data-ttu-id="85fba-111">**Inställningar** > **Visa alla Outlook-inställningar** > **e** > **autosvar** att öppna [inställningarna för autosvar](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/mail/automaticReplies).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="85fba-111">**Settings** > **View all Outlook Settings** > **Mail** > **Automatic replies** to open your [Automatic replies settings](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/mail/automaticReplies).</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="85fba-112">Välj Växla **Aktivera autosvar** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="85fba-112">Select the **Turn on automatic replies** toggle.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="85fba-113">Markera kryssrutan **Skicka svar endast under en viss tidsperiod** kan du:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="85fba-113">Selecting the **Send replies only during a time period** check box enables you to:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="85fba-114">Endast skicka svar när du väljer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="85fba-114">Only send replies when you choose.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="85fba-115">Om du inte anger en tidsperiod, förblir din autosvar på tills du stänger av den.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="85fba-115">If you don't set a time period, your automatic reply remains on until you turn it off.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="85fba-116">Blockera din kalender</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="85fba-116">Block your calendar</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="85fba-117">Avböj automatiskt nya inbjudningar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="85fba-117">Automatically decline new invitations</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="85fba-118">Tacka nej och Avbryt mina möten under denna period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="85fba-118">Decline and cancel my meetings during this period</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="85fba-119">I meddelanderutan skriver du ett meddelande som skickas till personer under tid du är borta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="85fba-119">In the message box, type a message to send to people during the time you're away.</span></span>
5. <span data-ttu-id="85fba-120">För att endast skicka svar till dina kontakter, markera kryssrutan **Skicka svar till endast kontakter** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="85fba-120">To only send replies to your contacts, select the **Send replies to contacts only** check box.</span></span>
6. <span data-ttu-id="85fba-121">Välj **Spara**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="85fba-121">Select **Save**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="85fba-122">Läs mer om [automatisk vidarebefordran i Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/14614626-9855-48dc-a986-dec81d07b1a0?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="85fba-122">Learn more about [automatic forwarding in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/14614626-9855-48dc-a986-dec81d07b1a0?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
